div.style: position: fixed; left: 50%; top: 50%; display:none; z-index: 100001

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: 72px; letter-spacing: 0.2px; white-space: nowrap; background-color: #ffffff; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #555555;
span.a: JH & HS Weekly Assignment List by Teacher

span.style: font-size: 14pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman';

p.span: Welcome, and thank you for taking the time to discover Highland ISD. Students at Highland quickly become an integral part of our education community. We strive to not only provide students with a high-quality education, but we also endeavor to maintain a caring atmosphere in which all students are taught the importance of consideration and respect. Parents and guardians have a vital role in the education of their children, and we actively encourage close cooperation between home and school. We also emphasize the necessity of communication. Here in our website, you will find information about upcoming extracurricular events, announcements, and other resources. We hope that you will join us in making your child’s time at Highland School both happy and successful.

div.p:
Our Mission
The mission of Highland ISD is to:

ul.li: Educate every student by combining the wisdom of yesterday, the technology of today, and the vision for tomorrow to develop within each student strong moral character, high self-esteem, and the desire to succeed.
Encourage parental and community involvement in the educational process.
Demonstrate responsibility to the community through sound fiscal management and open communications.

div.div:
Highland Independent School District
6625 FM 608, Roscoe, Texas 79545
Phone: (325) 766-3652 | Fax: (325) 766-2281
